# WKWebExtension.MatchPattern

**Class**

An object that represents a way to specify groups of URLs.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class MatchPattern
```

## Overview

All match patterns are specified as strings. Apart from the special `<all_urls>` pattern, match patterns consist of three parts: scheme, host, and path.

## Errors

- **WKWebExtension.MatchPattern.Error**: Constants that indicate errors in the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtension/MatchPattern] domain.
- **WKWebExtension.MatchPattern.Error.Code**: Constants that indicate errors in the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtension/MatchPattern] domain.
- **errorDomain**: A string that identifies the error domain.

## Structures

- **WKWebExtension.MatchPattern.Options**: Constants used by [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtension/MatchPattern] to indicate matching options.

## Initializers

- **init(scheme:host:path:)**: Returns a pattern object for the specified scheme, host, and path strings.
- **init(string:)**: Returns a pattern object for the specified pattern string.

## Instance Properties

- **host**: The host part of the pattern string, unless [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtension/MatchPattern/matchesAllURLs] is `YES`.
- **matchesAllHosts**: A Boolean value that indicates if the pattern is `<all_urls>` or has `*` as the host.
- **matchesAllURLs**: A Boolean value that indicates if the pattern is `<all_urls>`.
- **path**: The path part of the pattern string, unless [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtension/MatchPattern/matchesAllURLs] is `YES`.
- **scheme**: The scheme part of the pattern string, unless [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtension/MatchPattern/matchesAllURLs] is `YES`.
- **string**: The original pattern string.

## Instance Methods

- **matches(_:)**: Matches the receiver pattern against the specified URL.
- **matches(_:)**: Matches the receiver pattern against the specified pattern.
- **matches(_:options:)**: Matches the receiver pattern against the specified URL with options.
- **matches(_:options:)**: Matches the receiver pattern against the specified pattern with options.

## Type Methods

- **allHostsAndSchemes()**: Returns a pattern object that has `*` for scheme, host, and path.
- **allURLs()**: Returns a pattern object for `<all_urls>`.
- **registerCustomURLScheme(_:)**: Registers a custom URL scheme that can be used in match patterns.

## Classes

- **WKWebExtension.Action**: An object that encapsulates the properties for an individual web extension action.
- **WKWebExtension.Command**: An object that encapsulates the properties for an individual web extension command.
- **WKWebExtension.DataRecord**: An object that represents a record of stored data for a specific web extension context.
- **WKWebExtension.MessagePort**: An object that manages message-based communication with a web extension.
- **WKWebExtension.TabConfiguration**: An object that encapsulates configuration options for a tab in an extension.
- **WKWebExtension.WindowConfiguration**: An object that encapsulates configuration options for a window in an extension.
- **WKWebExtensionController.Configuration**: A [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtensionController/Configuration-swift.class] object with which to initialize a web extension controller.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- Sendable
